channel.title: How can I make it send a message when they login?
channel.description:
I have the interface, I just do not know what to add before I put it in client.java.
Like this:
I want to make it so, when you log in, there's a screen that says like, 'Hello! Welcome to my server... etc.'

item.title: How can I make it send a message when they login?
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

[quote=“Neverm.1nd, post:6, topic:274982”][quote author=`Joshua link=topic=363281.msg2759455#msg2759455 date=1240438461]
Just add that…lol, write the msgs you want it to send.
[/quote]

Yeah, where.[/quote]

In the initialize() method.

Read full topic
item.source: How can I make it send a message when they login?

item.title: How can I make it send a message when they login?
item.dc:creator: @Neverm.1nd Neverm.1nd
item.description:
@Neverm.1nd wrote:

No I’m trying to add:

//purp interface clearQuestInterface(); sendQuest("Close Window", 15949);//Close Text sendQuest("", 15950);//Line 1 sendQuest("", 15960);//Line 2 sendQuest("", 15959);//Line 3 sendQuest("", 15961);//Line 4 sendQuest("", 15951);//Line 5 sendQuest("", 15955);//Line 6 sendQuest("", 15953);//Line 7 sendQuest("", 15958);//Line 8 sendQuest("", 15952);//Line 9 sendQuest("", 15956);//Line 10 sendQuest("", 15954);//Line 11 sendQuest("", 15957);//line 12 showInterface(15944); flushOutStream();

But there was no interface like this in the source. I wanna know how to add it.

Read full topic
